projectsDescription: A few parts are highly technical. Contact me if you want more info about a project.

Personal Website.name: Personal Website
Personal Website.description: A complete revision of my personal website. I switched from Flask to Django and now use TailwindCSS. Additionally, the website is available in German and English.

Custom Framework for Django.name: Custom Framework for Django
Custom Framework for Django.description: My personal Django Framework I will use to build new websites faster and more effectively. I include the fundamentals to build an Api and optimized the folder structure.

Instadata Webapp + Scraper.name: Instadata Webapp + Scraper
Instadata Webapp + Scraper.description: A large instagram scraper built with Django that uses an API to communicate between user and program. The Scraper can be scaled seaminglessly and uses proxies. I built it to gather data for further Data-Science projects, so I used the Nominatim Geolocator and Regex to extract and order as much data as possible. I recommend you check out the README.

MainServerModule.name: MainServerModule
MainServerModule.description: A collection of modules that can A) securely connect to multiple of my Flask project APIs and exchange data aswell as periodically update the API-Key using Fernet-encryption B) Populate my Flask Webapp Framework C) Generate a basic PDF invoice.

TheTradersCircle.name: TheTradersCircle
TheTradersCircle.description: My client wanted to build an online community to teach others trading. I built a compelling logo and made a brand framework, and also helped a little with the overall business strategy.
